general.about: A people-centered software designer who dabbles with front-end engineering & nerds out on product strategy.

workExperience.heading: Software Designer at Zed Industries
workExperience.description: Design & code—contributing directly to the Rust-based Zed editor itself as well as the Next.js-powered site.
workExperience.title: Software Designer

workExperience.heading: Lead Designer at MUI
workExperience.description: Led the design team to make MUI a one-stop shop for React UI libraries. Supported various initiatives, from the core products—Material UI, Base UI, Joy UI, Pigment CSS, etc.—to growing the team & fostering a more mature product culture.
workExperience.title: Lead Designer

workExperience.heading: Senior Product Designer at Loggi
workExperience.description: Redesigned the driver app to align with a B2B-driven product strategy. Focused on increasing the delivery success rate.
workExperience.title: Senior Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Product Designer at Nexa
workExperience.description: Led design for a breakthrough doctor-focused product, which gathered multiple distributed health data points to enable them to see their patients' medical history holistically.
workExperience.title: Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Product Designer at iFood
workExperience.description: Designed the driver app from the ground up, supporting the first country-wide rollout.
workExperience.title: Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Designer at Rapiddo
workExperience.description: Joined as a design intern and contributed to all things design: from instructional branding animated videos to then landing on product design, helping optimize certain features of the driver app until iFood acquired the company.
workExperience.title: Designer
